definition: Huanghua county level city in Cangzhou 滄州|沧州[Cang1 zhou1], Hebei

sentences.english: Huanghua of natural and cultural tourism resources are more abundant.
sentences.chinese: 黃驊市境內自然和人文旅遊資源較爲豐富。

sentences.english: The rising-declining of Haifeng Town in Huanghua was impartibility with salt industry.
sentences.chinese: 黃驊市的海豐鎮遺址，其興衰與鹽業密不可分。
